title: You've Got a Friend in Me: Childhood Pals Achieve Michigan Tech Milestones Together - Michigan Technological University
content: You've Got a Friend in Me: Childhood Pals Achieve Michigan Tech Milestones Together  Michigan Technological University
description: Friends since first grade, scholastic competitors, Summer Youth Programs campers, fraternity brothers and 2022 Michigan Tech grads A.J. Alexa and Cody Slagle share their journey from Pok√©mon cards to diplomas.
